hooks.command: echo '=== Git Status ===' && git status -s 2>/dev/null | head -10 || true

file_path=$(cat /dev/stdin | python3 -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print(d.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path',''))"); if [[ "$file_path" == *.py ]]; then echo '=== Pyright ===' && pyright "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -30 || true; fi

file_path=$(cat /dev/stdin | python3 -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print(d.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path',''))"); if [[ "$file_path" == *.py ]]; then echo '=== Pylint ===' && pylint "$file_path" --disable=C0114,C0115,C0116 --max-line-length=120 2>&1 | head -20 || true; fi

file_path=$(cat /dev/stdin | python3 -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print(d.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path',''))"); if [[ "$file_path" == *.py ]]; then echo '=== Flake8 ===' && flake8 "$file_path" --max-line-length=120 2>&1 | head -15 || true; fi
